sect2.title: Installation de Tripwire
sect2.para: Compilez Tripwire en lançant les commandes suivantes:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../tripwire-&tripwire-version;-gcc3-build-fixes.patch && make -C src release && cp install/install.{sh,cfg} .
